channel.title: ACM/ASM Workshop on
channel.description: Recent content in ACM/ASM Workshop on

item.title: Overview
item.description: Personas Agenda Before you begin Credits Costs

item.title: 1. Host project
item.description: Set up the Host project with the Config Controller instance. Create Host projectDuration: 5 min | Persona: Org Admin Create Config ControllerDuration: 20 min | Persona: Org Admin Set up Host project's Git repoDuration: 10 min | Persona: Org Admin Enforce Tenant projects policiesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Org Admin

item.title: 2. Tenant project
item.description: Set up the Tenant project which will host later a GKE cluster, Artifact Registry, Memorystore (Redis), Cloud Armor, etc. Create Tenant projectDuration: 10 min | Persona: Org Admin Set up Tenant project's Git repoDuration: 5 min | Persona: Org Admin Enforce GCP resources policiesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Org Admin Allow MonitoringDuration: 2 min | Persona: Org Admin Set up MonitoringDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin

item.title: 3. Networking
item.description: Set up the Networking in the Tenant project. Allow NetworkingDuration: 2 min | Persona: Org Admin Set up NetworkDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin

item.title: 4. GKE cluster
item.description: Set up the GKE cluster. Allow GKEDuration: 5 min | Persona: Org Admin Enforce GKE policiesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Org Admin Create GKE clusterDuration: 20 min | Persona: Platform Admin Allow FleetDuration: 5 min | Persona: Org Admin Set up GKE configs's Git repoDuration: 10 min | Persona: Platform Admin Enforce Kubernetes policiesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Set up NetworkPolicies loggingDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin

item.title: 5. Artifact Registry
item.description: Set up Artifact Registry. Allow Artifact RegistryDuration: 5 min | Persona: Org Admin Create Artifact RegistryDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Enforce Artifact Registry policiesDuration: 10 min | Persona: Platform Admin

item.title: 6. Service Mesh
item.description: Set up Anthos Service Mesh (ASM). Allow ASMDuration: 5 min | Persona: Org Admin Install ASMDuration: 15 min | Persona: Platform Admin Set up ASM configsDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Enforce Service Mesh policiesDuration: 10 min | Persona: Platform Admin

item.title: 7. Ingress Gateway
item.description: Set up Anthos Service Mesh (ASM) Ingress Gateway. Create IP addressDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Allow Cloud ArmorDuration: 2 min | Persona: Org Admin Set up Cloud ArmorDuration: 10 min | Persona: Platform Admin Deploy Ingress GatewayDuration: 15 min | Persona: Platform Admin Deploy NetworkPoliciesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Deploy AuthorizationPoliciesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin

item.title: 8. Whereami app
item.description: Set up the Whereami app. Set up DNSDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Set up URL uptime checkDuration: 10 min | Persona: Platform Admin Configure Config SyncDuration: 10 min | Persona: Platform Admin Prepare containerDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Deploy appDuration: 10 min | Persona: Apps Operator Deploy AuthorizationPolicyDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Deploy NetworkPoliciesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Deploy SidecarDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator

item.title: 9. Online Boutique apps
item.description: Set up the Online Boutique apps. Set up DNSDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Set up URL uptime checkDuration: 10 min | Persona: Platform Admin Allow Config SyncDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Configure Config SyncDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Prepare containers and chartDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Deploy appsDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Deploy AuthorizationPoliciesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator

item.title: 10. Bank of Anthos apps
item.description: Set up the Bank of Anthos apps. Set up DNSDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Set up URL uptime checkDuration: 10 min | Persona: Platform Admin Configure Config SyncDuration: 10 min | Persona: Platform Admin Prepare containersDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Deploy appsDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Deploy AuthorizationPoliciesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Deploy NetworkPoliciesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Deploy SidecarsDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator

item.title: 11. Monitoring & Audit
item.description: Leverage the different Monitoring and Audit features in the Tenant project. Verify ASM versionDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Monitor apps securityDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Monitor apps healthDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Trace appsDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Monitor WAF rulesDuration: 5 min | Persona: Platform Admin Scan workloadsDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator Monitor resources syncedDuration: 5 min | Persona: Apps Operator
